quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life. – Charles Darwin
fact: The following sentence: `A rough-coated, dough-faced, thoughtful ploughman strode through the streets of Scarborough; after falling into a slough, he coughed and hiccoughed.` Contains the nine different pronunciations of "ough" in the English Language.
joke: Did you hear about the two thieves who stole a calendar? They each got six months.
